text: Eight Thousand Li of Cloud and Moon may refer to: *Eight Thousand Li of Cloud and Moon (film), a 1947 Chinese drama film set in the 1930s and 1940s *Eight Thousand Li of Cloud and Moon (TV series), a 1988 Taiwanese historical television series based on the life of Yue Fei (1103–1142) ==See also== *Man Jiang Hong, a poem by Yue Fei where the phrase first appeared
title: Eight Thousand Li of Cloud and Moon
